Class BookingController

java.lang.Object
BTOManagementSystem.Controller.BookingController
public class BookingController extends Object
Controller class responsible for handling the booking of flats for applicants who have been successfully approved for a BTO project.

  • Method Details

    • bookFlatForApplicant

      public boolean bookFlatForApplicant(HDBOfficerAssignedProjectView projectView, String applicantNRIC, String projectName)
      Processes the flat booking for a specific applicant under a specific project.

      The method performs the following steps:

      • Validates if the applicant has an existing application for the project.
      • Checks if the application status is SUCCESSFUL.
      • Displays application details and prompts the officer for booking confirmation.
      • Checks flat availability based on flat type and project data.
      • If confirmed and available, updates the application status and reduces the unit count.
      Parameters:
      projectView - the view used by the HDB officer to interact with booking options
      applicantNRIC - the NRIC of the applicant booking the flat
      projectName - the name of the project the applicant is booking under
      Returns:
      true if booking was successful, false otherwise
